Fusilli: Fuse Easilyïƒ

Welcome to Fusilli: Fuse Easily!ïƒ

Have you got multimodal data but not sure how to combine them for your machine learning task? Look no further! This library provides a way to compare different fusion methods for your multimodal data.

ğŸŒ¸ API Reference ğŸŒ¸ïƒ

fusionlibrary.fusion_models

Fusion models: one py file per model

fusionlibrary.datamodules

This file contains the datamodules for the different modalities and the different fusion methods.

fusionlibrary.train_functions

Contains the train_and_test function: trains and tests a model and, if k_fold trained, a fold.

fusionlibrary.eval_functions.Plotter(...)

Class for plotting the results of the models.

fusionlibrary.utils.model_chooser

Function/functions to help user choose model's to run

fusionlibrary.utils.pl_utils

Functions for initializing the pytorch lightning logger and trainer.
